LanguageData.Gun_AAR_CP.label: Arasaka Advanced Recon
LanguageData.Gun_AAR_CP.description: 10mm Assault Rifle - The Advenced Recon is Arasaka’s latest response to the problem of Cyborg crime.
LanguageData.Gun_AAR_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AAR_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AAR_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka Advanced Recon
LanguageData.Gun_AAW65_CP.label: Arasaka AW-65
LanguageData.Gun_AAW65_CP.description: 5.56mm Assault Rifle - Short, fat, and menacing is the only way to describe this rifle. Arasaka developed this weapon with maximum kill ratio's in mind, and succeeded. Its large suppresser keeps the noise down while it unleashes its load of 5.56 ammunition. Comes standard with a low light telescopic sight.
LanguageData.Gun_AAW65_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AAW65_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AAW65_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka AW-65
LanguageData.Gun_ABAR54_CP.label: Arasaka BAR-54
LanguageData.Gun_ABAR54_CP.description: 4.5mm Assault Rifle - This bullpup assault rifle is a favorite among police and SDF forces in the Asian Rim.
LanguageData.Gun_ABAR54_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ABAR54_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ABAR54_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka BAR-54
LanguageData.Gun_AKIARA_CP.label: Arasaka Kiara
LanguageData.Gun_AKIARA_CP.description: 6mm Assault Rifle - This Is a stunning assault rifle with a built in 8 shot 10 gauge shotgun.

LanguageData.Gun_AKIARA_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AKIARA_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka Kiara
LanguageData.Gun_ASA456_CP.label: Arasaka SA-456
LanguageData.Gun_ASA456_CP.description: 7mm Assault Rifle - Arasaka's newest assault rifle. The 60 round drum magazine almost makes this a light squad assault weapon, but the weight, size, and versatility keep in nicely in the assault rifle realm.
LanguageData.Gun_ASA456_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ASA456_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ASA456_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka SA-456
LanguageData.Gun_ASA460_CP.label: Arasaka SA-460
LanguageData.Gun_ASA460_CP.description: 7.62mm Assault Rifle - The big brother of the SA-456. Chambered in 7.62mm. A bit more accurate due to the longer barrel.
LanguageData.Gun_ASA460_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ASA460_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ASA460_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka SA-460
LanguageData.Gun_AX61_CP.label: Arasaka X-61
LanguageData.Gun_AX61_CP.description: Railgun. Arasaka has created a true man-portable railgun roughly the same size and weight as a large assault rifle. This weapon uses a 15mm nickel cadmium projectile.
LanguageData.Gun_AX61_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AX61_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AX61_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Arasaka X-61
LanguageData.Gun_BAAR25_CP.label: Budget Arms AR-25
LanguageData.Gun_BAAR25_CP.description: 7mm Assault Rifle - Unispired and inexpensive, but at least it won't blow up in your face (we hope).
LanguageData.Gun_BAAR25_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_BAAR25_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_BAAR25_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Budget Arms AR-25
LanguageData.Gun_BACLAWS_CP.label: Budget Arms CLAWS
LanguageData.Gun_BACLAWS_CP.description: 6mm Assault Rifle - The CLAWS is the polymer one shot version of the H&K CAWS weapon system. While the original system was designed to accept a variety of different ammunition, the CLAWS is only chambered for 6mm rounds. The weapon jams frequently, and has a reputation for explosively misfiring during full auto fire.
LanguageData.Gun_BACLAWS_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_BACLAWS_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_BACLAWS_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Budget Arms CLAWS
LanguageData.Gun_DLBLT24_CP.label: Dai Lung BLT-24
LanguageData.Gun_DLBLT24_CP.description: 7.62mm Assault Rifle - Someone really needs to perform a less than surgical strike on Dai-Lung, their weapons are simply to dangerous to both user and target to ever be justified. A prime example is this assault rifle. Among street gangs, who's philosophy seems to be "the bigger a gun the better" this weapon sells like hotcakes. Rumor has it the weapon also has a large distribution to rebels in the rim.
LanguageData.Gun_DLBLT24_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_DLBLT24_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_DLBLT24_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Dai Lung BLT-24
LanguageData.Gun_DLDR40_CP.label: Dai Lung DR-40
LanguageData.Gun_DLDR40_CP.description: 4.5mm Assault Rifle - An inexpensive, but not poorly designed rifle, popular with many third world militaries, police forces, and civilians worldwide.
LanguageData.Gun_DLDR40_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_DLDR40_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_DLDR40_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Dai Lung DR-40

LanguageData.Gun_FABR328_CP.description: 7.62mm Assault Rifle - A decent assault rifle from Federated arms, although it falls short in the accuracy department. A retracting stock is standard.

LanguageData.Gun_MM52AR_CP.label: Militech M-52AR
LanguageData.Gun_MM52AR_CP.description: 10mm Assault Rifle - An assault weapon built for the urban environment. The rifle features digital ammo counter along with a retractable stock (now available with fixed stock for greater aesthetic and comfort) and the highest ammo capacity and caliber of an weapon in its class.
LanguageData.Gun_MM52AR_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MM52AR_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MM52AR_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech M-52AR
LanguageData.Gun_MM56AR_CP.label: Militech M-56AR
LanguageData.Gun_MM56AR_CP.description: 7.62mm Assault Rifle - This is actually a step down from the M-52AR, whose ammunition is shorter but more powerful.. Still this weapon is more accurate, and the 7.62 ammunition is far more common. It's also a bit cheaper, making this a far more suited to urban combat.
LanguageData.Gun_MM56AR_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MM56AR_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MM56AR_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech M-56AR

LanguageData.Gun_MNINJA_CP.label: Militech Ninja
LanguageData.Gun_MNINJA_CP.description: 5mm Rifle - A highly reliable caseless design with no moving parts and an integral silencer. A fully plastic magazing and electrical firing pin makes this assault weapon incredibly quiet. Perfect for black ops!
LanguageData.Gun_MNINJA_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MNINJA_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MNINJA_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech Ninja
LanguageData.Gun_MRLA_CP.label: Militech Ronin Assault Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_MRLA_CP.description: 5.56mm Assault Rifle - The Militech Ronin standard edition is the classic light assault rifle of the modern battlefield. It only weighs 3 kilograms loaded.
LanguageData.Gun_MRLA_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MRLA_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MRLA_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Militech Ronin Assault Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_SAR892_CP.label: Sternmeyer AR-892
LanguageData.Gun_SAR892_CP.description: 5.56mm Assault Rifle - A light bullpup assault rifle, a fine weapon from Sternmeyer, more attractive than their usual faire.

LanguageData.Gun_SHRO113_CP.label: Sternmeyer HRO-113
LanguageData.Gun_SHRO113_CP.description: 6.5mm Assault Rifle - A simple if effective assault rifle by Sternmeyer.

LanguageData.Gun_SST5_CP.label: Stolbovoy ST-5
LanguageData.Gun_SST5_CP.description: 5.56mm Assault Rifle - A light, sturdy bullpup weapon. The ST-5 was designed to withstand the rugged environmental conditions in the rim. Using innovative design and special lubricants, Stolbovoy has created a weapon that can operate reliably under the most adverse conditions, including heat, cold, mud, dampness, sand and grit, lubricant contamination, and corrosive environments. One of die toughest, most reliable assault rifles in die world; troops are quoted as saying, "It never breaks!"
LanguageData.Gun_SST5_CP.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_SST5_CP.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_SST5_CP.verbs.Verb_ShootCP.label: Stolbovoy ST-5
